title: The Mesmerist.2003.720p.BluRay.AVC-mfcorrea
description:
The maker of "The Mesmerist" took a very old and apparently decomposed copy of the silent film "The Bells" (with Lionel Barrymore and Boris Karloff) and set it to some jazzy music. As the film skips and decomposition bubble appear, the music works in tandem. While this sound very simple and perhaps stupid, it's actually a very interesting experiment--especially since the music really works well with the film.
